name: UpdateScimUserRecord
description:
Apply SCIM patch operations to update user details.

Use this tool to perform a sequence of SCIM patch operations on an existing user. Suitable for updating user attributes according to SCIM specification.

parameters.name: user_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the user to be updated. It should match the user's existing SCIM record.

parameters.name: scim_patch_operations
parameters.description: A list of SCIM patch operations to perform on a user, including operations and schemas.

value.description: Replacment value. Not used when performing the `'remove'` operation.

Operations.description:
A list of SCIM patch operations to perform.

See the [SCIM PATCH protocol](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7644#section-3.5.2) for details.

schemas.description: A list of schemas, including at least SCIM's PatchOp schema.
